name: Some Shooter
description:
Avoid/shoot zombies while avoiding falling storage containers

Controls

  • Move with WASD keys
  • Shoot with Left Mouse button
  • Zoom with Right Mouse button
  • Pickup Ammo with F key
  • Jump with Space key
  • Pause with Escape key

Objective

  • Run away from enemies
  • Turn around and shoot enemies
  • Go for a high score!
